unearnedTrophies.desc: Finish each round in Arcade Mode on Medium or higher in 20 seconds or less. Too easy.

unearnedTrophies.name: Good Start
unearnedTrophies.desc: All of nature must withstand a trial. You must clear 10 trials in Trial Mode to succeed.

unearnedTrophies.name: Trail of Trials
unearnedTrophies.desc: There is no shortcut in the art of Yoga. Aim to clear any character's Trial Mode trials!

unearnedTrophies.name: Trial Athlete
unearnedTrophies.desc: I shall assimilate all and be all-powerful! Clear all Trial Mode challenges, and so can you!

unearnedTrophies.name: Oh! My Car!
unearnedTrophies.desc: Hee hee, destruction is so much fun! Score 80,000 points or more in the Car Crusher bonus stage!

unearnedTrophies.name: Barrel of Laughs
unearnedTrophies.desc: No need for barrels without oil! Score 110,000 points or more in the Barrel Buster bonus stage!

unearnedTrophies.name: It Begins
unearnedTrophies.desc: The fight starts here! Set your Title and Icon, and begin fighting online!

unearnedTrophies.name: Threepeat
unearnedTrophies.desc: You think being this good is easy? Let's see you win 3 Ranked Matches in a row, champ!

unearnedTrophies.name: Fivepeat
unearnedTrophies.desc: This is your real power, child? Show me it's not luck by winning 5 Ranked Matches in a row!

unearnedTrophies.name: Tenpeat
unearnedTrophies.desc: Don't hold back your true potential! Win 10 Ranked Matches in a row!

unearnedTrophies.name: Moving On Up
unearnedTrophies.desc: Ya need to do anything to reach the top of the food chain! Let's see a Rank Up via Ranked Match!

unearnedTrophies.name: Now You C Me...
unearnedTrophies.desc: I wrestle only the strong! You shall rank up to C Rank if you wanna face me, comrade!

unearnedTrophies.name: From C to Shining C
unearnedTrophies.desc: You think you're good, don't you? Prove it by ranking up all characters to C Rank!

unearnedTrophies.name: Road to Victory
unearnedTrophies.desc: You wanna get that fight money? You're gonna have to win 10 matches online first, sucka!

unearnedTrophies.name: Battle Master
unearnedTrophies.desc: Only winners can attain such beauty. Win 30 matches online and I may share my beauty secrets.

unearnedTrophies.name: Legendary Fighter
unearnedTrophies.desc: I shall make you the right hand of Shadaloo if you can win 100 matches online!

unearnedTrophies.name: Worldly Warrior
unearnedTrophies.desc: Let's do this, amigo! Fight 50 matches online, because that's the only way to become strong!

unearnedTrophies.name: Bring it on!
unearnedTrophies.desc: No comrade, this will not do! We must become stronger, for our fans! Fight 100 matches online!

unearnedTrophies.name: This is Madness!
unearnedTrophies.desc: Fighting is fun, huh? Well then, let's aim for 300 matches online fought, OK buddy?

unearnedTrophies.name: Team Player
unearnedTrophies.desc: A 1-on-1 fight is fun, but it's more fun with friends! Try fighting in a Team Battle!

unearnedTrophies.name: Team Mate
unearnedTrophies.desc: Win 1 Team Battle match, and you will learn that teamwork can help you become stronger!

unearnedTrophies.name: Teamworker
unearnedTrophies.desc: A pro can win with any team. Win 10 Team Battles but don't forget, you have to win too!

unearnedTrophies.name: Keep on Truckin'
unearnedTrophies.desc: If you want to focus on nothing but the fight, entering an Endless Battle is for you!

unearnedTrophies.name: Three For The Road
unearnedTrophies.desc: In the pursuit of strength, one must have a goal! In Endless Battle win 3 matches in a row.

unearnedTrophies.name: Endless Ten
unearnedTrophies.desc: Throw away your fears and focus on the fight! Win 10 fights in a row in Endless Battle!

unearnedTrophies.name: Replayer
unearnedTrophies.desc: Watch 30 Replays via the Replay Channel! Isn't it fun watching people go at it tooth and nail!?

unearnedTrophies.name: Endless Lobbyist
unearnedTrophies.desc: It's only natural for warriors to seek fights! Create 30 Endless Battle lobbies!

unearnedTrophies.name: Team Lobbyist
unearnedTrophies.desc: Hey mon, battlin' is fun, no? Go out and create 30 Team Battle lobbies and enjoy the rhythm!

unearnedTrophies.name: Quarter Up
unearnedTrophies.desc: Fight 30 opponents via Arcade Fight Request. It'd be easy with the right bait, he he.

unearnedTrophies.name: The Awakening
unearnedTrophies.desc: As if you could ever defeat Evil Ryu in Arcade Mode on the hardest difficulty.  See for yourself!

unearnedTrophies.name: Birth of the Oni
unearnedTrophies.desc: To surpass the power of Oni, you must defeat him in Arcade Mode on the hardest setting.

unearnedTrophies.name: Just Enough!

unearnedTrophies.desc: Clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using a continue with Yang. It's simple!

unearnedTrophies.desc: Assert leadership and clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using a continue with Rolento.

unearnedTrophies.desc: No more mocking! Clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using a continue with Poison.

unearnedTrophies.name: Giant Attack
unearnedTrophies.desc: Reach the league's top and clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using continue with Hugo.

unearnedTrophies.name: A dish best served cold

unearnedTrophies.name: Double Feature

unearnedTrophies.name: All For One
